for (let i = 1; i <= 6; i++) {
    pumps[`pump${i}`] = i <= Set_No_Of_Pump ? 1 : 0;
}

// Set each pump status individually in flow context
for (let i = 1; i <= 6; i++) {
    flow.set(`pump${i}`, pumps[`pump${i}`]);
